tweets.text:
For most adolescents (~60%), smartphone use does *not* affect self-esteem.

For some, there are relevant negative effects (~20%), and for some positive ones (~15%).

Data: 387 adolescents from Netherlands, 34.930 observations. Great work from @IrenevanDriel & @UvA_AWeSome! #ica21 https://t.co/T3DfR4pShK

Jeongwon Yang, Ploypin Chuenterawong, and Qi Ni discuss the spread of fake news about North Korea, by coding comments in multiple languages (English, Korean, Thai, Chinese), and locating differences in response by language. Key ideas on translation and news. #ICA21 #ICA_ICD
